holidays.name: Bitcoin's Birthday
holidays.desc: On this day in 2009, the Genesis Block was mined by Satoshi Nakamoto, officially starting the Bitcoin blockchain.

holidays.name: Proof of Keys Day
holidays.desc: On this day in 2019, to celebrate Bitcoin's 10th Birthday, Trace Mayer started an annual Proof-of-Keys Celebration. Participats declare monetary sovereignty by withdrawing their BTC into their own custody. Not your keys, not your bitcoin! You can read Trace Mayer's original tweet here.
